data.title: EPA Certifications
data.meta_description: EPA manages various certification programs such as air-conditioning and refrigeration technicians (Section 608), lead-safe renovation and paint abatement, vehicle and engine certification, and laboratories certified to analyze drinking water samples.
data.text:
EPA manages several programs that certify technicians, service locations, laboratories or products. The page contains an automatically-generated list of EPA webpages that include the word “certification” in the title. Entries are listed with the most recently updated pages at the top.

NOTE: Some certification programs are delegated to state authorities and/or authorized testing organizations. If you do not find the information you need below, please reach out to your state authority. Find your local authority's contact information in the list of Health and Environmental Agencies of U.S. States and Territories.
